Name: Languages
Description:
You can Check all the supported languages by Transfluent using Languages method.
It will return the languages in JSON format which contains id, name and code.

Name: LanguagesCheck
Description:
Check if language pair is supported on requested level.
The language level is optional and set to 3 by default.

Parameters.desc:
Translator level: 
pair of translators (#3), 
a professional translator (#2) 
or a native speaker (#1)
Customer id. Optionally you can call the method without providing customer id but you MUST provide a valid authentication token.
